lead_paragraph: THOMAS--Merrie Dee, born in Bay Ridge, Brooklyn, long time resident of the Upper West Side, passed away March 6, 2016. She graduated with honors from Hunter College and spent her working career in accounting and hospitality management in New York and Florida. In Miami Beach, she contributed to the renaissance of Miami Beach's Art Deco District working in its club/restaurant industry. She is survived by her husband of 46 years, Richard, her son Jake, daughter Sara and grandson Justyce. Also mourning her loss are her sisters Kathy Skalski (Dan), Jane Gross (Saul) and her brother Jack Dee (Glorianne) as well as many nieces, nephews, cousins, neighbors and dear friends. A Memorial Service in celebration of her life followed by a reception will occur at 1pm April 2, 2016 at St. Michael's Church, 99th St. and Amsterdam Ave, NY, NY 10025. 1/3
